bug.author: jy-cds
bug.description: Helloï¼Œ After installing garage and also cloning the repository, I opened up the "trpo_gym_tf_cartpole" Jupyter notebook from the example folder but when I execute the first cell, it gives an error that says: No module named 'garage.logger'. I am not sure why this is happening as the garage seemed to be installed correctly. Thanks in advance!

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jy-cds>@jy-cds</denchmark-link>
Thanks for trying garage! This appears to be a bug. The garage.logger modules were moved to the dowel pip package. You should be able to work around the problem by installing dowel and changing imports to dowel instead of garage.logger
